author: SegmentLinking
body:
This PR introduces code to write a more comprehensive record of LST object data (LSTOD).

There are some minor modifications in the code relevant to CMSSW, but they shouldn't have any effect in CMSSW workflows

I also fixed a memory leak that I accidentally introduced in #48014 (but it only affected the standalone part).

c.c. @slava77
title: LST: introduce code to write object data in standalone and fix memory leak
